title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 171.7 - Evaluation of Grant Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 171.7 - Evaluation of Grant Applications

State Regulations

Grant applications shall be initially evaluated by a Scoring

Committee. The Scoring Committee shall then forward their recommendation to the

Commissioner for his/her approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
171.7

Adopted

New

York State Register July 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 26, eff. 7/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
